segments.text: May I interest you in some dessert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we have chocolate mousse cake , homemade fresh strawberry shortcake , and a spicy rum apple crisp for our specials .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since there are four of you , would you like to split a second dessert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good suggestion . Could you please bring us a chocolate mousse cake and four dessert forks , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like coffee or tea with your dessert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I will be right back with your desserts and drinks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you ! We have really enjoyed our meal here .
segments.speaker: S2
